name: Nevado - Bark & Run
description:
Nevado – Bark & Run is a fast-paced auto-runner where a cute dog will face perilous obstacles to get to his owner in a time of war. Run through 4 different locations facing original hazards in every one. From enemy soldiers, fog and mud, to wild animals and cannon balls falling from the sky. Do you have what it take to bring Nevado to his destination?

The game has 18 levels in world 1, with 3 more worlds coming as continuing updates. Each worlds has it own obstacles and traps. It is available for PC, Mac and Linux with an Android version coming next free of charge.

Features
  • 4 worlds, 18 levels each
  • Fast-paced action
  • Original enemies in every world
  • Lovely hand-made graphics
  • Free updates
  • Runaways pigs
  • Complete source code and assets so you can make your own runner*
Conscience
  • No DRM and no IAP
  • All updates free
  • No copyright take-downs on Let's Plays
System requirements
  • Windows / Mac / Linux
  • 2GB+ RAM
  • Dual Core 2GHz+ CPU
